n = int(input())
s = input()
t = input()

if s == t:
    print("NO")
else:
    res = ""
    for i in range(n):
        res += s[0] + s[1] + t[0] + t[1] + s[0] + t[1]
    print("YES")
    print(res)

# SOLUTION
n = int(input())
s = input()
t = input()

if s == t:
    print("NO")
else:
    print("YES")
    for i in range(n):
        print(s[0], end="")
        print(s[1], end="")
        print(t[0], end="")
        print(t[1], end="")
        print(s[0], end="")
        print(s[1], end="")

n = int(input())
s = input()
t = input()

if s == t:
    print("NO")
else:
    print("YES")
    print(s[0] * n + t[0] * n + s[1] * n)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    t = input()

    if s == t:
        print("NO")
        return

    res = ""
    for i in range(n):
        res += s[0] + s[1] + t[0] + t[1] + s[0] + t[1]
    print("YES")
    print(res)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    s = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
    t = sys.stdin.readline().strip()

    if s[0] == t[0] or s[0] == t[1] or s[1] == t[0] or s[1] == t[1]:
        print("NO")
        return

    res = ""
    for i in range(n):
        res += s[0]
        res += s[1]
        res += t[0]
        res += t[1]
        res += s[0]
        res += t[1]

    print("YES")
    print(res)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
    s = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
    t = sys.stdin.readline().strip()

    if s[0] == t[0] or s[1] == t[1]:
        print("NO")
        return

    res = ""
    for i in range(n):
        res += s[0] + s[1] + t[0] + t[1]
    print("YES")
    print(res)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
